description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Unit 9-9A in the Face2Face Intermediate coursebook, such as "allergy", "operating theatre", "ward", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosakata dari Unit 9-9a di Face2face Intermediate CourseBook, seperti "Allergy", "Operating Theatre", "Ward", dll.

en.long: a medical condition in which one's body severely reacts to a specific substance if it is inhaled, touched, or ingested

id.long: Kondisi medis di mana tubuh seseorang bereaksi terhadap zat tertentu jika dihirup, disentuh, atau dicerna

en.long: a severe recurring type of headache, particularly affecting one side of the head, and often causing visual disturbances and nausea

id.long: Jenis sakit kepala berulang yang parah, terutama mempengaruhi satu sisi kepala, dan sering menyebabkan gangguan visual dan mual

en.long: a separate area in a hospital for patients with similar conditions

id.long: Area terpisah di rumah sakit untuk pasien dengan kondisi yang sama

en.long: a doctor's office or clinic where patients can receive medical treatment or advice

id.long: Kantor atau klinik dokter di mana pasien dapat menerima perawatan atau nasihat medis

en.long: a physician who is not a specialist but treats people with acute and chronic illnesses who live in a particular area

id.long: seorang dokter yang bukan spesialis tetapi merawat orang dengan penyakit akut dan kronis yang tinggal di daerah tertentu

en.long: the written instructions of a doctor that allow the patient to get the medicines needed

id.long: instruksi tertulis dari seorang dokter yang memungkinkan pasien untuk mendapatkan obat yang dibutuhkan

en.long: a condition in which harmful germs, such as bacteria or viruses, invade the body and cause harm, leading to symptoms such as fever, pain, and swelling

id.long: Suatu kondisi di mana kuman berbahaya, seperti bakteri atau virus, menyerang tubuh dan menyebabkan kerusakan, yang menyebabkan gejala seperti demam, nyeri, dan pembengkakan

en.long: a doctor who performs medical operation

id.long: seorang dokter yang melakukan operasi medis

en.long: a disease that causes shortness of breath and difficulty in breathing

id.long: penyakit yang menyebabkan sesak napas dan kesulitan bernapas

en.long: a person with a lot of knowledge and skills in a particular field

id.long: seseorang dengan banyak pengetahuan dan keterampilan di bidang tertentu

en.long: a room in a hospital where surgical operations are performed

id.long: Kamar di rumah sakit tempat operasi bedah dilakukan
